name: Olympiades
description:
Compete against your friends or players from all over the world, and try to reach the top of the Olympiad ranking.
It is a multiplayer competition based on educational mini-games. Trials combining speed, agility and knowledge of 2 to 3 minutes follow one another; To win, you have to find the most correct answers in the allotted time. Between each mini-game, players find themselves in a giant playground with agility courses, a soccer field and other activities.

Gameplay features


  • Play with friends: Face your friends in private games and define yourself which trials you will play.
  • Online multiplayer: Compete against players from all over the world in public matchmaking games
  • Improve yourself: Progress and improve at your own pace in training mode
  • A playground: Catch your breath between trials in the playground. Meet the other participants for a football match, a play of giant piano or a parkour race.
  • Cross platform: Play with players on other platforms (android, iOS, PC, MacOS)

the Trials


  • The thousand doors hallway: to navigate the infinite corridor without being slowed down, you must solve increasingly complex mental arithmetic questions. 1 operation, 3 response options. Speed up to get ahead of your competitors.
  • The globetrotter: Move on a giant atlas to position yourself on the countries, capitals or monuments mentioned. Speed, precision and dexterity are as essential as the knowledge of geographical landmarks to win this trial.
  • The chronological duel: Order a deck of historical dates without error to move on to the next deck. The more you progress, the closer the events to order are to each other.
